attributes.action: encourage the royal mint to permanently introduce a 25p coin into general circulation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Post- decimalisation, the crown was revalued at 25 new pence as a commemerative issue only. We believe that a regular new coin would save on looses change and simplify cash transactions, as is the case with the US quarter dollar or 'quarter'.
